name: hypersonic
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
travelling, or designed to travel, more than five times faster than the speed of sound: NASA successfully completed its first hypersonic flight since the 1960s. Hypersonic missiles cut down the time from identifying the target and then hitting it to just few minutes. The Air Force is developing a hypersonic engine designed to fly at Mach 6.5 speed, or more than 4,000 miles per hour.
